Alessei Bartok (né Albreckt Bartjes; 29 June 1899 – 5 December 2008) was a Dreunist revolutionary, Dwerchan Adventurer, and the First Speaker of the People’s Guild.

The Dwerchan Liberation Front (1994-1996)

Trial and Banishment
